title: Annual Fundraising Gala 2024
description: Join us for an evening of inspiration, entertainment, and fundraising to support our ongoing campaigns and initiatives.
longDescription: Our Annual Fundraising Gala is the highlight of our year, bringing together donors, volunteers, beneficiaries, and supporters for an unforgettable evening. This year's theme is 'Hope in Action' and will feature inspiring stories from our beneficiaries, cultural performances, a silent auction, and keynote speeches from renowned social activists. All proceeds will go directly to our active campaigns including Clean Water, Education for Every Child, and Women Empowerment initiatives.
address: Sardar Patel Marg, Diplomatic Enclave, New Delhi, 110021

agenda.activity: Closing Remarks and Vote of Thanks
agenda.speaker: Board Members

title: Community Health Camp - Gurgaon
description: Free health checkups, vaccinations, and health awareness sessions for the local community.
longDescription: Our monthly community health camps provide free medical services to underserved populations. This camp will offer general health checkups, blood pressure and diabetes screening, eye examinations, dental checkups, and vaccinations for children. We'll also conduct health awareness sessions on topics like nutrition, hygiene, and preventive healthcare. Our team of qualified doctors, nurses, and volunteers will ensure quality care for all attendees.
requirements: Bring previous medical reports if any

title: Volunteer Training Workshop
description: Comprehensive training session for new volunteers covering our programs, methodologies, and field work preparation.
longDescription: This intensive training workshop is designed for new volunteers who want to actively participate in our field programs. The session will cover our organizational mission and values, detailed overview of all our programs, field work methodologies, safety protocols, and hands-on training modules. Participants will learn about community engagement, data collection, report writing, and emergency procedures. The workshop includes interactive sessions, case studies, and practical exercises to prepare volunteers for effective field work.
address: Block A, Sector 18, Noida, Uttar Pradesh, 201301

title: Environmental Awareness Drive
description: Tree plantation drive and environmental awareness campaign in partnership with local schools and communities.
longDescription: Join us for a day dedicated to environmental conservation and awareness. This event combines a tree plantation drive with educational sessions about climate change, sustainable living, and environmental protection. We'll plant native trees in designated areas, conduct workshops for students and community members, and distribute eco-friendly materials. The event aims to create environmental consciousness and encourage sustainable practices in daily life.
requirements: Wear comfortable clothes and closed shoes
